sentences.sentence: From this time dated their plan of play actin'.
sentences.translation: 从这个时候起，他们的演戏计划就开始了。

sentences.sentence: "Bless us all, I can see tha’ has a good bit o’ play actin’ to do," said Susan Sowerby.
sentences.translation: “上帝保佑我们，看来，你们得加油演戏啦。”苏珊·索尔比说。

sentences.sentence: Actin cleavage by caspase-3 may accelerate proteosome dependent muscle proteolysis.
sentences.translation: 通过 caspase-3 剪切的 Actin 可能加速蛋白酶体依赖的肌肉蛋白水解。
